symc.name: SHACF_AUTOAPPEND_FORCE_OFF
symc.desc: Ignore the registry default and force the AutoAppend feature off. This flag must be used in combination with one or more of the SHACF_FILESYS* or SHACF_URL* flags.

symc.name: SHACF_AUTOAPPEND_FORCE_ON
symc.desc: Ignore the registry value and force the AutoAppend feature on. The completed string will be displayed in the edit box with the added characters highlighted. This flag must be used in combination with one or more of the SHACF_FILESYS* or SHACF_URL* flags.

symc.name: SHACF_AUTOSUGGEST_FORCE_OFF
symc.desc: Ignore the registry default and force the AutoSuggest feature off. This flag must be used in combination with one or more of the SHACF_FILESYS* or SHACF_URL* flags.

symc.name: SHACF_AUTOSUGGEST_FORCE_ON
symc.desc: Ignore the registry value and force the AutoSuggest feature on. A selection of possible completed strings will be displayed as a drop-down list, below the edit box. This flag must be used in combination with one or more of the SHACF_FILESYS* or SHACF_URL* flags.

symc.name: SHACF_DEFAULT
symc.desc: The default setting, equivalent to SHACF_FILESYSTEM | SHACF_URLALL. SHACF_DEFAULT cannot be combined with any other flags.

symc.name: SHACF_FILESYS_DIRS
symc.desc: Include the file system and directories, UNC servers, and UNC server shares.

symc.name: SHACF_FILESYSTEM
symc.desc: Include the file system and the rest of the Shell (Desktop, Computer, and Control Panel, for example).

symc.name: SHACF_URLALL
symc.desc: Include the URLs in the users History and Recently Used lists. Equivalent to SHACF_URLHISTORY | SHACF_URLMRU.

symc.name: SHACF_URLHISTORY
symc.desc: Include the URLs in the user's History list.

symc.name: SHACF_URLMRU
symc.desc: Include the URLs in the user's Recently Used list.

symc.name: SHACF_USETAB
symc.desc: Allow the user to select from the autosuggest list by pressing the TAB key. If this flag is not set, pressing the TAB key will shift focus to the next control and close the autosuggest list. If SHACF_USETAB is set, pressing the TAB key will select the first item in the list. Pressing TAB again will select the next item in the list, and so on. When the user reaches the end of the list, the next TAB key press will cycle the focus back to the edit control. This flag must be used in combination with one or more of the SHACF_FILESYS* or SHACF_URL* flags listed on this page.
